house_listing.house_description: Surrounded by executive homes on acreage this custom knock-out one story is on 3 acres!Only 31/2 years old and gorgeous! Arches, extensive wood and tile floors; lovely wood moldings. Tri[ple split bedrooms; formal living plus huge family room open to kitchen! Loads ofwindows overlook back paradise. 20x12 storage building; 30 x 40 buiilding w/ac & heat -is perfect for hobbies, workshop or guest quarters. Great location for home & business combo. One of "Fogarty's Finest"
